website_summaries.verdict: The Epson VS345 provides good data- and video-image quality for a low-priced WXGA projector.
pros: Long lamp life for an LCD projector
Good video- and data-image quality in our tests

customer_reviews.title: Really a great projector, first project for it was projecting a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really a great projector, first project for it was projecting a school logo on a gymnasium wall at over 28 ft tall. Was done with half the gym lights still on...!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great for business presentations
customer_reviews.text: This projector is just great for business presentations. You can see everything very clearly. It does give off a fair amount of heat so having a room where you can vent some of the air is useful, but it's bearable. The only complaint I have is that you have to place the projector pretty far from the screen or wall in order to project a large image. It would be awesome if I could just resize the picture as big as I wanted without having to physically move the projector back. But for the price, this has been perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This projector is the best under 600$ projector I have owned. They say it is not suitable for home movie theaters... not true. The colors are vibrant, the picture is truly HD (I use the Althaus 4K projector screen fixed) The brightness is incredible and more than perfect with 3300 lumens for any room. Even if you don't have blinds and want to watch a soccer game while your room is bright, you can easily do that. I am so impressed with the ease of use and adjustments. Very glad I purchased this projector. Little hint, if you don't like the fact that there is only one buy this with it for 10 bucks.:
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for home video
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Would definitely buy again for home video system. One note - no audio output for speakers. Using it with a kindle fire stick, we have to use an hdmi splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Ana A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in our church
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our church. Bright enough for a sunny day. Hooked up through Apple TV - slight issue with it blanking out for a few seconds 3 or 4 times during the service. Sill have not figured out if it's the projector or the Apple TV set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you need to run audio out of the projector
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, gave it 3 stars because there's no way to send audio out of the projector. Apparently need an HDMI splitter. The RCA on the back are for audio in only
customer_reviews.author: John McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Plug & play is great. But there's lag
customer_reviews.text: The machine was super easy to get going. Connected to a new Windows 10 laptop via HDMI and it works like a charm. However, there is a lag between the sound (voices) and the images (doesn't match their mouths). I was playing a Netflix movie so I put a DVD into the laptop to see if that corrected it. It did not. Unless I can find a solution, I will be returning this. It was pricey.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector for the Price Point.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector for the price. This is one of the best projectors I've used. It sets up in minutes - literally attach the cord to the back and to the computer - perfect. The resolution is dynamic - I used it to present to a group of 200 hundred in a very large room - everyone was able to see the screen and even the small details were enhanced. I highly recommend buying this projector. Works extremely well with MacBook and Wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is amazing and the built in speakers work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is amazing and the built in speakers work like a charm. The speakers in the projector work really well. I would defenetly recommend anyone buying this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano G.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fantastic picture
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the EX 7220, it's bright, works great.. only thing I could find to fault it would be it runs a tad hot (and the menu interface software still rather bites, but that's rather to be expected with Epson nowadays). I use this in my media room, hooked to the XBox One and Playstation 4, Roku and computer.. and the picture is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Little

customer_reviews.title: Epson VS345 WXGA 3LCD Projector Works Great for Home and Work
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a home theater projector and also as a projector for public presentations of my "Stop Invasive Garlic Mustard!" power points. The projector is great and very easy to use. I haven't used it extensively yet, but so far its everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Gartner

customer_reviews.title: sharp and bright
customer_reviews.text: its great, we use it between conference rooms here and there. It is very sharp, and bright enough where we really dont need the lights off to see it.
customer_reviews.author: DanDaMan

customer_reviews.title: Great projectors for well lit rooms
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Epson VS345 for my church that can host ~150 people. These projectors replaced two BenQ VGA projectors based on DLP technology. The video quality between the two projectors is day and night. With the BenQ projectors, it was increasing difficult to get a sharp image. Photos never came out right. It would be too muddy and fuzzy to view the details. Despite being in a well lit sanctuary, Epson VS345 perform extremely well to display vivid color and sharpness. We can see video and photos with clarity. It really improves the quality of presentation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Drive-In
customer_reviews.text: I love the nostalgia of the drive-in movies, so I built my own version in my backyard. This projector is great. The image is crystal clear. I added a sound bar since we sit back farther from the screen, and I used a Firestick to access my movies. Picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: After having an InFocus projector for a few years, the bulb finally died so instead of replacing the bulb, I went out looking for a new projector. After being recommended by the school IT department, I went with this Epson projector and I have never been happier. The picture is top notch and the machine is very quite. The only thing that I've noticed is the projector gets extremely hot, although projectors run hot. But overall I am very beyond satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Good projector for price
customer_reviews.text: Quick heads up, I wouldn't buy the warranty doesn't seem to cover anything (bulb, electric or water malfunctions). Pretty good quality for the price, just replace the bulbs yourself! Don't drool on it too much or hook it up to an unreliable power source. Projection range for 125 inches was 12.5 feet away for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING clarity
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to read instructions. And great view! Even in a well-lit room. I give instructional demonstrations, and using this with it's clarity in a classroom setting, with not needing to dim the lights is a huge plus. It's an Epson. Great quality. I just wish I had purchased this one, first.
customer_reviews.author: digireader

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Bright enough to work during the day with usual ambient light. Clear picture / video
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly bought this for my college dorm room last year instead of spending $600 for a large tv or using a small one. The picture quality is incredible and it has had many hours and movie nights on it so far. It’s still going very strong. Absolutely love this product and if you’re looking for a basic projector setup this is the one to get. The only thing, get an HDMI switch box to be able to use external speakers and have more than 1 HDMI port accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome. I still need to get a proper screen
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome. I still need to get a proper screen, as I'm using it on a rough white wall, but it still looks great. Easy setup. Did a lot of research before picking this type/brand.
customer_reviews.author: travis s

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using it to play the Division a lot projected on the wall. Image is stunning, bright and vibrant. No complaints after nearly 3 months. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable projector
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this portable projector. It provides a bright colorful screen image, even in daylight. I’ve gotten compliments from guest speakers and the flexibility of using it in relatively large rooms or small spaces has been a great bonus. Easy to set up and use. I’m not a tech geek, but have used other projectors before. This was less complicated to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L

customer_reviews.title: This is a good projecter. I was impressed with the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good projecter. I was impressed with the quality of the image for the price I paid. I did have a few issues occasionally with it not wanting to recognize the HDMI input. I just shut it down and restarted it which seemed to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and bright. I use this projector outside and wanted something that works with some day light. You can get a picture in full daylight and the picture is very clear when it’s dark
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: came in as described and power point look great! 1st power pointer for me and hopefully it will last. Made of quality material and easy to set up on my lap top with HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: workingman

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Projector has a great display and excellent screen adjustments. Very happy with projector! Could not get the remote to pair with my laptop and did not have instructions to help.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Downing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector for your office needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector to replace our previous Epson projectors that finally gave out at 15 years of service. This upgraded model is very user friendly and has a bright picture for any presentation. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its great!
customer_reviews.text: As far as the projector, its great! But... i ordered it friday with a arrival for saturday before 8pm, i called amazon TONS of times saturday and they ensured me that it would be here saturday ... and it wasnt. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tyler patrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality picture but not the audio... Four stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality picture on screen and easy on menu operation, worth the money! No audio output. Split sound from HDMI input to amplifier but background with loud noisy. My computer can not have both HDMI output and Headphone working at the same time. I give four star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazo

customer_reviews.title: ... need of a new projector and we are so glad we finally got one
customer_reviews.text: Our church was in need of a new projector and we are so glad we finally got one! This one shows all of the colors so vibrant. Great deal and glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Died in a month. High fan speed when opening and flashing red light. Normal use, nothing done. Really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyBao

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No Audio out for external audio system when using HDMI connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector.
customer_reviews.text: It is very bright and the colors are very vivid as well. A big step up from my other projector.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good with this projector. We used to see our movies, big screen. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Raymundo.

customer_reviews.title: easy to mount on a pole
customer_reviews.text: easy to mount on a pole, great picture and easy to use. little slow on powering up but not bad produce for the price
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly in a brightly lit ballroom for Power Point presentations all day long without a hiccup.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and power for DJING.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. As a local DJ this does everything I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use. Impressively bright and crisp image!
customer_reviews.author: dap_159

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! I LOVE it! I LOVE it!!!! I haven't mounted it as yet but have used in on a portable stand and I'm amazed by the quality of the image even in bright sunlit rooms. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Eustace E. Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Thank God we do not have any issues with this projector... we hope it will continue working right :)
customer_reviews.author: Sol Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Since our local genealogical society was constantly borrowing equipment to use, the purchase of this projector is a blessing to our group. Easy to use. So far, all is well.
customer_reviews.author: threedreamer

customer_reviews.title: really fantastic images and very easy to work with my iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around a lot and settled on this model. It was so worth it! I use it in the classroom and for stage work...really fantastic images and very easy to work with my iPad or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Mannix Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome projector. Plenty bright and clear in 3/4 light! Crisp picture quality as well. My only complaint is that WiFi connectivity is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Michael Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect projector for any need.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Awesome picture. Great for both business use and movie. Ambient lighting has no impact on the display.
customer_reviews.author: Pau Scarfone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for a church use! Very clear image. Love all the features on it as well
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: easy to use controls
customer_reviews.text: Really worth the money. Solid unit; easy to use controls. Watch out for incompatibilities with older HDMI sources, however (not Epson's fault).
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this projector. It meets all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great projector - bright
customer_reviews.text: Great projector - bright, affordable, light and has common input/outputs. This is good enough for most non-commercial applications. Keystonining is very easy because the horizontal axis can be controlled with a slider and you can fine tune both axises with the keystone button. The projector also auto-keystones when you move it which can be good or bad depending on the situation. However, I think this function is useful to most people. Also, the built in speaker is surprisingly loud. The only downside of the projector is it runs really hot and the fan is somewhat loud. However, I expected a lot worse for a projector of this size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for a small classroom in a normal fluorescent light setting. Setting is very easy and can be done in a few minutes (depending on how much you want to set) The projector was mounted on the ceiling using a universal mount from the previous projector (Boxlight) Colors are projected vividly on a screen even under fluorescent light and natural light combined. Fan noise is quite minimal and does not interfere with our activities (watching a short video clips or presentation) Overall, the projector was a good choice for our use considering its cost and performance.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Good projector.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for company; I don't use it, but I haven't heard a single complaint from those that do use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this projector! Worked very well out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Roanoke

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but only certain tasks are useful
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome. High quality, easy to use. Its only drawback that I can find is that it expands fast. This is great if you want to project for a big screen, but this is difficult to make it usable in small conference rooms or in homes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do presentations often and the audience loves that they can see clearly in a brightly lit room even with sunlight coming in!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of presentations and public speaking and this Epson unit simply ROCKS! I use a USB 3.0 to VGA converter to attach to my Yoga900 laptop. The picture quality is amazing even in a brightly lit room. In my opinion, it's no louder than my older projector and an overall decent price for the quality you get for this unit. This was one purchase I've been saving up for and I am so glad that I found it. If you are looking for a similar projector, don't go for any lower models than this one to save a few bucks. Spend the little extra for this one and you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: kiliki

customer_reviews.title: If this projector is in your budget, buy it. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a presentation and it performed above and beyond expectations. I have owned hi-def projectors in the past and have used them from movies to video games to computer animation output. This unit looked amazing and was quite simple to setup. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mick89

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector, and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector, and very bright. Finally we can project things and see them pretty clearly without turning all of the lights off in our office. The remote is also a nice touch. No complaints, and works perfectly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Image is very good but fan noise is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I use it for presentations. Image is very good but fan noise is horrible. Much worse than Infocus old projectors. The purpose of buying this was to be portable and have ability to meet in small rooms. Fan noise requires larger space to avoid distructions.
customer_reviews.author: OC Man

customer_reviews.title: good picture, but why can't anyone tell me the ...
customer_reviews.text: good picture, but why can't anyone tell me the correct replacement for my last epson projector a good deal - but i had to return it, for it projects upward, like most projectors do now
customer_reviews.author: Bruce77ch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector
customer_reviews.text: Believe me I've tried 5 other projectors before deciding on keeping this one . Does not get hot at all even after 4 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: shellshock

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it has a double serial port to hook up monitor and projector.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Logsden

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: Good projector for the money. The setup.was easy and it performed as expected during our 8 hour meeting.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Bright picture and easy instructions to set up and check for updates
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far but I have no complaints. Bright picture and easy instructions to set up and check for updates.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Dohse

customer_reviews.title: Super projector!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. Have used it only once thus far but performance was superb.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall R. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Worked extremely well for my needs. Simple to set up and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Will Larremore

customer_reviews.title: Edson projector
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 Star projector if it had audio out. Other than that, this thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it seems as though it is going to work out fine,.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for several groups where we live, and it seems as though it is going to work out fine,.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It was well worth the money and performed admirably for my intended use which is projecting photos and slides for small public groups. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I haven't used it but one time so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Truchelut

product_meta.title: Epson VS355 WXGA 3,300 lumens color brightness (color light output) 3,300 lumens white brightness (white light output) HDMI 3LCD projector
product_meta.description: Style:VS355Featuring enhanced resolution for hd-quality presentations, the VS355 portable projector is perfect for widescreen laptops. Compact and reliable, it delivers 3, 300 lumens of color/white brightness (1) for vivid images, even in well-lit rooms. With WXGA resolution (1280 x 800), you see 2x more detail than SVGA. Its simple setup tools get you up and running quickly. 1. Color brightness (color light output) and white brightness (white light output) will vary depending on usage conditions. Color light output measured in accordance with IDMS 15. 4; white light output measured in accordance with ISO 21118. 4. Based on TFCinfo: U. S. Projector Brand Customer Perception and Preference Study, Multimedia Projectors 2017. 5. For convenient and reasonable recycling options, visit our official site. 6. SmartWay is an innovative partnership of the U. S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.
feature_bullets: More accurate, vivid color, even in well-lit rooms — 3,300 lumens of equal color and white brightness (1).
WXGA resolution (1280 x 800) — 2x more resolution than SVGA for projecting HD presentations and video; perfect for widescreen laptops.
Fast, easy setup with Epson — get up and running in no time with easy image adjustments and convenient control.
Works with the latest laptops and media players — supports HDMI, the standard in connectivity, for digital video and audio in one cable.
Projection Lens : Type - Optical zoom, F-number - 1.49 – 1.72, Focal Length - 16.9 mm to 20.28 mm, Zoom Ratio - Optical zoom 1.0 – 1.2

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
